survey_name: Outdoor Gear Rental Customer Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have rented outdoor gear (e.g., camping equipment, hiking gear) to understand their satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: Which type of outdoor gear did you rent most recently?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for mobile-friendliness. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specific responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which type of outdoor gear did you rent most recently?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the condition of the rented gear?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the condition of the rented gear?

questions.question_text: How easy was the rental process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Consider adding a tooltip explaining what 'rental process' includes (e.g., booking, pickup, return).

script.question_text: How easy was the rental process?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for renting outdoor gear instead of purchasing it?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field. Randomize answer options to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for renting outdoor gear instead of purchasing it?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to rent outdoor gear from this company again?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This is a key metric for customer retention.

script.question_text: How likely are you to rent outdoor gear from this company again?

questions.question_text: Did you experience any issues with the rented gear? If yes, please describe.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Optional question.

script.question_text: Did you experience any issues with the rented gear? If yes, please describe.

questions.question_text: Which of the following features would improve your rental experience? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following features would improve your rental experience? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness of the rented gear?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This is a critical factor for customer satisfaction.

script.question_text: How would you rate the cleanliness of the rented gear?

questions.question_text: How did you hear about our outdoor gear rental service?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for mobile-friendliness. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: How did you hear about our outdoor gear rental service?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our outdoor gear rental service to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This is a key Net Promoter Score (NPS) question.

script.question_text: Would you recommend our outdoor gear rental service to others?

questions.question_text: What additional outdoor gear would you like to see available for rent?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture suggestions. Optional question.

script.question_text: What additional outdoor gear would you like to see available for rent?
